key_points: Tom Brady expresses desire to toss the Lombardi Trophy overhand in a future championship boat parade.
Brady wants to improve on his previous underhand toss, aiming for an overhand throw with more authority.
He shared his New Year's resolution on the Let's Go! podcast with host Jim Gray.
A previous video of Brady's underhand Lombardi Trophy toss went viral internationally.
The underhanded toss was successful, landing in the hands of teammate Cameron Brate.
Brady humorously noted that the feasibility of an overhand toss depends on his consumption of avocado tequila.
He also mentioned receiving a warning from the NFL for smashing a Microsoft Surface Pro tablet out of frustration during a game.
The NFL warned Brady that another tablet-related incident would result in a fine.
The incident of throwing and smashing the tablet has since become a Twitter meme.
Brady's comments suggest a light-hearted approach to both his on-field frustrations and his championship celebrations.
